definitions.definition: The occurrence within a plant of two distinct forms of any part .
The occurrence in an animal species of two distinct types of individual .
A property of certain substances that enables them to exist in two distinct crystalline forms.

main_definition: ( biology ) The occurrence within a plant of two distinct forms of any part .
secondary_definitions: ( biology ) The occurrence in an animal species of two distinct types of individual .
( geology ) A property of certain substances that enables them to exist in two distinct crystalline forms.
